document_data.caption: A bard hits the perfect note with stone shatter.
document_data.name: Stone Shatter
document_data.mainbody: '''''Stone shatter''''' was a sonic [[evocation]] [[spell]] used by [[bard]]s.
document_data.Effects: With this spell a bard could shatter a stone object or creature with a single well-placed note of perfect pitch. The size of the target that could be affected by this spell depended on the bard's skill level. Flying stone from the shattering effect could harm those standing nearby.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components to cast.
